channel.title: Diet-Disease Suggest on Pantrypoints
channel.description: Recent content in Diet-Disease Suggest on Pantrypoints

item.title: Diet-Disease Overview
item.description: Pantrypoints Diet-Disease Suggest is a Food and Disease Reference app that suggests the healing food for common diseases. It aims to promote a Planetary Health Diet for the well-being of humans and the environment. It connects to Pantrypoints via Pantrypoints Health. Type Description Mobile Pantrypreneur Diet-Disease Suggest is an offline mobile app with online links to sellers and to ISAIAH Base Models Name Context Veg Sellers Junk Food Diseases Carbon Footprint Changelog 2023-06-01: Renamed SCENAC Suggest to Diet-Disease Reference App
